name: arrayflow
description: Vanilla JavaScript array iterators with control-flow capability. That's all.
author: Tomas Aparicio

scripts.browser: ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs arrayflow.js --mangle --preamble '/* ArrayFlow.js v.0.1 - MIT License - https://github.com/h2non/arrayflow */' --source-map arrayflow.min.js.map --source-map-url http://cdn.rawgit.com/h2non/arrayflow/master/arrayflow.min.js.map > arrayflow.min.js
